column4: Anyone having trouble with the daylight saving time change.  I have my time zone set to New_York, but I havent seen any correction for daylight saving change
Anyone know how to correct this ?
an issue is way too vague

i've read in the forums that it may be leading to a system lock up.  I get lockups where i can't use the keyboard or mouse and have to do a hard reboot.  Some people are saying its the nvidia drivers some say the, xorg, others say a sata driver
